idea-plugin.name: base16 Shades of Purple
idea-plugin.description:
Base 16 Shades of Purple for Jetbrains IDE


---------------


Colors by Iolar Demartini Junior (http://github.com/demartini) based on Shades of Purple Theme (https://github.com/ahmadawais/shades-of-purple-vscode).. Theme made by Tinted Theming (https://github.com/tinted-theming/base16-jetbrains)
